amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the prohibitions against aggregating emissions from any oil or gas exploration or production well and emissions. Additionally, amendment sought to require the EPA to issue a rule adding hydrogen sulfide to the list of hazardous air pollutants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-607 to amend the Clean Air Act to repeal the prohibitions against aggregating emissions from any oil or gas exploration or production well and emissions. Additionally, it requires the EPA to issue a rule adding hydrogen sulfide to the list of hazardous air pollutants.
